Text.Page:
Crush the Brogar Legion supporters and teach them the folly of fighting the federation. Eliminate {@LinkCreature:27#13#Thulsan guardians}, {@LinkCreature:27#14#conjurers}, {@LinkCreature:27#15#followers}, {@LinkCreature:27#4#eldritch sentinels}, {@LinkCreature:27#6#merciless iskaragards}, and {@LinkCreature:27#7#savage iskaragards} and collect their insignias.

Report to Vlara when your mission is complete.
Our fight is just and the outcome certain with soldiers such as yourself fighting the enemy. Thank you.
I don't see enough insignias. Please return when the mission is complete.
